official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to make mandatory the imposition of certain costs in cases of frivolous claims and defenses.
short_title: Sanctions for Frivolous Litigation Act of 1986

summary.text: Sanctions for Frivolous Litigation Act of 1986 - Provides that attorneys who assert frivolous claims and defenses shall be required to satisfy certain costs, including attorneys' fees. (Current law provides that the imposition of such costs is discretionary with the court.)

titles.title: Sanctions for Frivolous Litigation Act of 1986
